data.text: The word of the Lord which came unto Zephaniah the son of Cushi, the son of Gedaliah, the son of Amariah, the son of Hizkiah, in the days of Josiah the son of Amon, king of Judah.
I will utterly consume all things from off the land, saith the Lord.
I will consume man and beast;
I will also stretch out mine hand upon Judah,
And them that worship the host of heaven upon the housetops;
And them that are turned back from the Lord;
Hold thy peace at the presence of the Lord God:
And it shall come to pass in the day of the Lordâ€™s sacrifice,
In the same day also will I punish all those that leap on the threshold,
And it shall come to pass in that day, saith the Lord,
And it shall come to pass at that time,
Therefore their goods shall become a booty, and their houses a desolation:
The great day of the Lord is near,
That day is a day of wrath,
A day of the trumpet and alarm
And I will bring distress upon men, that they shall walk like blind men,
Neither their silver nor their gold shall be able to deliver them
